title: More fans allowed at Devils games as Prudential Center capacity increases this week | How to buy Devils tickets
body: New Jersey Devils vs. New York Islanders, March 2, 2021Beginning this week, the number of  fans allowed to attend home games at the Prudential Center will increase as the state eases  restrictions.Monday that, effective Friday, April 2, professional and college games played indoors in New Jersey can admit 20% of the venue’s capacity, double the current allowance of 10%.The Prudential Center will host its first home game with double the fans on Friday, April 2, when the Washington Capitals come to Newark.Fans interested in attending the contest, or any Devils home game for the rest of the season, can buy tickets at  or .
